text: uṅkaḷil evarēṉum maṉaiviyarai viṭṭu iṟakkum nilaiyil iruppārkaḷāṉāl, taṅkaḷ maṉaiviyarukku ōrāṇṭu varai (uṇavu, uṭai pōṉṟa tēvaikaḷaik koṭuttu) ātarittu, (vīṭṭai viṭṭu avarkaḷ) veḷiyēṟṟappaṭātapaṭi (vāricakaḷukku) avarkaḷ maraṇa cācaṉam kūṟutal vēṇṭum; āṉāl, appeṇkaḷ tāṅkaḷē veḷiyē ceṉṟu muṟaippaṭi taṅkaḷ kāriyaṅkaḷaic ceytu koṇṭārkaḷāṉāl, (atil) uṅkaḷ mītu kuṟṟamillai - mēlum allāh vallamaiyuṭaiyavaṉum, aṟivāṟṟal uṭaiyōṉum āvāṉ
